entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Forecast issued 08:38 AM NDT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 08:38 AM NDT Friday 29 April 2016
